frontmatter.title: Getting Started with StatsD Receiver in AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector
frontmatter.description: StatsD receiver is an agent that collects [StatsD metrics](https://github.com/statsd/statsd/blob/master/docs/metric_types.md) and do the aggregation in a customer defined interval(default value is 60s). You can send counters, gauges and timer/histogram to StatsD receiver. The StatsD receiver will send the aggregated metrics to the following workflow.
